snippet: The diamond district, on a block of West 47th Street, pulses with the competition of the jewelry sellers, who are always looking for a way to make a deal.
abstract: Photographer Christian Hansen has captured images of high-octane sales hustle of Manhattan's diamond district.
lead_paragraph: The diamond district, on a block of West 47th Street, pulses with the competition of the jewelry sellers, who are always looking for a way to make a deal.

headline.seo: In the Diamond District, Glittering Jewels and Vibrant Lives
